title: Second Language Acquisition Program for Intermediate Learners Using Interactive Text Chat

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Russian grammar and vocabulary knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners are office workers with time constraints, studying in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can acquire and utilize 50 intermediate-level Russian vocabulary items through interactive text chat.
Learners can perform interactive tasks that address information, reasoning, and opinion gaps in a motivational chat environment with over 80% participation.
Learners demonstrate a 15% or greater improvement in oral production skills compared to pre-assessment at the program's conclusion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
